snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is giving his second State of the State address on Wednesday.
abstract: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is giving his second State of the State address on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, New York's 56th governor, delivered his second State of the State address on Wednesday at the Empire State Plaza convention center in Albany. Mr. Cuomo's speech, which can be watched in the player above, focused on economic development issues, including the expansion of casino gambling, and on increased accountability for the state's public school system.

headline.main: Video of Cuomo's State of the State Address
